column1: Dagnir Glaurunga was the title inscribed on the tall grey stone that marked Túrins burial mound by Cabed Naeramarth above the swirling waters of the Taeglin. Carved in the Angerthas Daeron
column2: they commemorated his heroic slaying of the dragon Glaurung — Dagnir Glaurunga means "Glaurungs Bane".
